ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Attn: Virus Warning ! ! !
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I figured as much.  It s a nasty little tricky bugger.  It hit our offices last week because one of my friends wrote someone else who works here, and she
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:03 PM 4/30/2001 -0400, you wrote:
>I aplogize for that, I got the virus from the cleric mailing list ironically
>and thought I hap wiped it off my system... I was wrong, and a few emails
>got out wit it before I caught it. Talies has already sent the info for
>curing it...


I figured as much. It's a nasty little tricky bugger. It hit our offices
last week because one of my friends wrote someone else who works here, and
she opened the attachment. over 300 messages later.... *grins*

The really ironic part is, the guy who started THAT whole chain is running
for King of my local LARP Kingdom - against me ;) Wish me luck on my new
slogan:

Vote for Snicker - Virus Free Since '93!

*eg*

Talies the Wanderer
